00023 CFeatureDlg::CFeatureDlg
00024     (
00025     CWnd                * aParent,
00026     FmiApplicationLayer & aCom
00027     )
00028     : CDialog( IDD_FEATURE_SELECT, aParent )
00029     , mCom( aCom )

00031     mFeatureCount = 0;

00041 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00047 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00048 BOOL CFeatureDlg::OnInitDialog()
00049 {
00050     mUnicode     = (CButton*)GetDlgItem( IDC_FEATURE_CHK_UNICODE );
00051     mA607        = (CButton*)GetDlgItem( IDC_FEATURE_CHK_A607 );
00052     mMultidriver = (CButton*)GetDlgItem( IDC_FEATURE_CHK_MULTIDRIVER );
00053     mPasswords   = (CButton*)GetDlgItem( IDC_FEATURE_CHK_PASSWORDS );
00054 
00055     mUnicode->SetCheck( BST_CHECKED );
00056     mA607->SetCheck( BST_CHECKED );
00057 
00058     return CDialog::OnInitDialog();
00059 }
00060 
00061 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00067 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00068 void CFeatureDlg::checkFeature
00069     (
00070     CButton          * aCheckBox,
00071     fmi_feature_type   aFeature
00072     )
00073 {
00074     switch( aCheckBox->GetCheck() )
00075     {
00076     case BST_CHECKED:
00077         mFeatureCodes[mFeatureCount] = (uint16)( aFeature | FEATURE_STATE_ENABLED );
00078         ++mFeatureCount;
00079         break;
00080 
00081     case BST_UNCHECKED:
00082         mFeatureCodes[mFeatureCount] = (uint16)( aFeature | FEATURE_STATE_DISABLED );
00083         ++mFeatureCount;
00084         break;
00085 
00086     default:
00087         break;
00088 
00089     }
00090 }
00091 
00092 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00096 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00097 void CFeatureDlg::OnBnClickedOk()
00098 {
00099     // Default values
00100     mCom.mClientCodepage = CODEPAGE_ASCII;
00101     mCom.mUsePasswords = FALSE;
00102     mCom.mUseMultipleDrivers = FALSE;
00103 
00104     if( BST_CHECKED == mUnicode->GetCheck() )
00105     {
00106         mCom.mClientCodepage = CODEPAGE_UNICODE;
00107     }
00108 
00109     if( BST_CHECKED == mPasswords->GetCheck() )
00110     {
00111         mCom.mUsePasswords = TRUE;
00112     }
00113 
00114     if( BST_CHECKED == mMultidriver->GetCheck() )
00115     {
00116         mCom.mUseMultipleDrivers = TRUE;
00117     }
00118 
00119     // Build and send the enable request
00120     checkFeature( mUnicode, FEATURE_ID_UNICODE );
00121     checkFeature( mA607, FEATURE_ID_A607_SUPPORT );
00122     checkFeature( mPasswords, FEATURE_ID_DRIVER_PASSWORDS );
00123     checkFeature( mMultidriver, FEATURE_ID_MULTIPLE_DRIVERS );
00124 
00125     mCom.sendEnable( mFeatureCodes, mFeatureCount );
00126 
00127     OnOK();
00128 }
